title: Yanbou Ninbou Tonbou no Koutsuu Anzen

synonyms: Yanbo Ninbo Tonbo no Koutsuu Anzen
alternative_titles.ja: ヤンボウ・ニンボウ・トンボ ウの交通安全

synopsis: An education film for children starring the Yanbou Ninbou Tonbou it teaches traffic safety. Though the setting may be hard to relate unless in a rural area, as the cast tries to cross an old wooden suspension bridge that falls apart and they must make their way to safety.
